Description:
Manage phone calls, emails, and correspondence, and route messages to appropriate individuals.
Coordinate and schedule meetings, appointments, and events, and ensure calendars are up-to-date.
Prepare, format, and edit documents, reports, presentations, and other materials as needed.
Input and maintain accurate data in spreadsheets, databases, and software systems.
Organize and maintain physical and digital filing systems for easy document retrieval.
Assist with travel arrangements, including booking flights, accommodations, and transportation.
Support meeting logistics, prepare materials, take minutes, and distribute follow-up actions.
Monitor and replenish office supplies, ensuring essential items are available for team members.
Greet visitors, clients, and employees, and provide general assistance to guests.
Help with event planning, workshops, conferences, and company-wide activities.
Assist with expense reports, track receipts, and ensure adherence to company expense policies.
Conduct research, gather information, and compile data as required.
Update and maintain contact lists, mailing lists, and databases.
Provide overall administrative support to managers, teams, or departments as needed.Skills
Skills:
High school diploma or equivalent; additional education or training in office administration is a plus.
Proven experience as an Administrative Assistant or in a similar administrative role.
Proficiency in office software, including Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook).
Excellent organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities.
Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.
Attention to detail and accuracy in data entry and document preparation.
Ability to maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive information with professionalism.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to find solutions to day-to-day challenges.
Adaptability and willingness to learn new processes and tools.
Time management skills and the ability to meet deadlines.
Positive attitude, professionalism, and a proactive approach to tasks.
Customer service orientation and ability to interact with visitors and clients.
Familiarity with office equipment and basic office operations.
Midscale level in English both written and verbal.
